title: Android Studio Electric Eel Canary brings Live Edit to the Compose Preview
content:
After months of testing on the Canary channel, Google finally graduated Android Studio Dolphin to the beta channel at its I/O Developer Conference today. The beta release packs various Jetpack Compose features and improvements, new features for the Wear OS emulator, and a couple of additional developer tools. Along with the Dolphin beta release, Google

The post Android Studio Electric Eel Canary brings Live Edit to the Compose Preview appeared first on XDA.
description: At its I/O Developer Conference today, Google announced a new Canary release for Android Studio codenamed Electric Eel. Download from the link in the post.
